channel.title: Comments on: Let’s see how stupid I can be

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
BTW, I had no problem sending massive mails from my Yahoo account to Kindle, but Google blocked me after sending ~200 documents in about 15 mails. I don't want to blame the policy as I hate abusers more than Yahoo and Google, but I would appreciate Google if it can be as smart as Yahoo, as it can easily determine what I'm doing.
Or maybe Yahoo trusts me just because I've been with Yahoo for too long? If this is the case, I have nothing to blame Google but I'm going to use Yahoo more for sure.
Either way Google is a loser, hehe.
item.content:encoded:
BTW, I had no problem sending massive mails from my Yahoo account to Kindle, but Google blocked me after sending ~200 documents in about 15 mails. I don’t want to blame the policy as I hate abusers more than Yahoo and Google, but I would appreciate Google if it can be as smart as Yahoo, as it can easily determine what I’m doing.

Or maybe Yahoo trusts me just because I’ve been with Yahoo for too long? If this is the case, I have nothing to blame Google but I’m going to use Yahoo more for sure.

Either way Google is a loser, hehe.
